short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a verse from the Quran each day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
9M2PJU Quran Verse of the Day brings the wisdom and beauty of the Quran right to your browser! Each day, discover a new verse along with its English translation, providing you with inspiration and reflection.

If you enjoy using this extension and would like to support its development, consider buying me a coffee! https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/9m2pju


Features:

Daily Verse: A fresh Quranic verse delivered every day to enrich your spiritual journey.
Arabic and English: View the verse in Arabic with its translation in English for better understanding.
Gregorian and Hijri Dates: Stay informed with the current Gregorian and Hijri dates, displayed in an easy-to-read format.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean, modern design that enhances your browsing experience.
Whether you're seeking daily inspiration, studying the Quran, or just curious about its teachings, this extension is perfect for everyone. Install 9M2PJU Quran Verse of the Day and start your day with a meaningful message!
